water_bottle.name: Bottle of Water
water_bottle.flavour_text:
A plastic bottle filled with fresh water.

Use to obtain 1 liter of water.

water_gallon.name: Gallon of Water
water_gallon.flavour_text:
An old plastic gallon jug, filled to the brim with fresh water.

Use to obtain 10 liters of water.

water_keg.name: Keg o' Water
water_keg.flavour_text:
A metal keg which once held beer, but now holds water.

Use to obtain 50 liters of water.

Breweries are far few and in between out in the wasteland, given there's barely any grain left. Distillieries and bathtub operations, on the other hand, are plentiful.

water_drum.name: Water Drum
water_drum.flavour_text:
A large oil drum, cleaned out and filled with fresh water. Oil is so rare that it can't be found in drums anymore.
Use to obtain 100 liters of water.
